channel.title: Hoster needed
channel.description:
Hey, I have a server I have been working on a little here and there, and I am going to now put it online. I need a hoster that I can trust, and will be active for having the server online. Please no one with a junk computer lol. If anyone knows of a website that I can upload and have it hosted FOR FREE that would be really awesome. Yes, you get admin on the server and Co-Owner position automatically.
~ Otherwise, if someone could tell me what I need to do to port forward so I can host on my own, I have a, 2wire 2700HG-D router, it has 3 computers running internet off it if that matters. Please just reply on this thread, or feel free to add my msn: i_ride_failure@hotmail.com Thanks!
